scripts.build-native: napi build --cargo-cwd ../.. --platform -p next-rs-napi --cargo-name next_rs_napi --features plugin,rustls-tls --js false native
scripts.build-native-woa: napi build --platform -p next-rs-napi --cargo-name next_rs_napi --features plugin,native-tls --js false native
scripts.build-native-no-plugin: napi build --platform -p next-rs-napi --cargo-name next_rs_napi --js false native
scripts.build-native-no-plugin-woa: napi build --platform -p next-rs-napi --cargo-name next_rs_napi --cargo-flags=--no-default-features --features native-tls --js false native
